title: C PROGRAMMING
description: Learn the fundamentals of structured programming using the C language.

title: E- GOVERNANCE
description: Explore the use of digital tools to improve government services and processes.

title: PYTHON PROGRAMMING
description: Understand Python programming for software development and automation.

title: DATABASE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
description: Study how to design, use, and manage relational databases effectively.

title: INTERNET AND INTRANET
description: Explore communication technologies used in global and internal networks.

title: TENSORFLOW
description: Dive into machine learning with Google's TensorFlow framework.

title: WEB TECHNOLOGY
description: Learn how websites and web applications are developed and deployed.

title: OOP(Object Oriented Programming)
description: Master object-oriented principles like classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: INFORMATION SYSTEM
description: Understand systems that collect, process, and distribute information.

title: BIG DATA TECHNOLOGIES
description: Work with tools and techniques to process large volumes of data.

title: COMPUTER NETWORK AND SECURITY
description: Learn networking fundamentals along with cybersecurity principles.

title: DATA STRUCTURE AND ALGORITHM
description: Develop efficient problem-solving skills using data structures and algorithms.

title: OBJECT ORIENTED ANALYSIS AND DESIGN
description: Model and design software systems using object-oriented techniques.

title: DISTRIBUTED SYSTEM
description: Explore systems that run across multiple computers to achieve a common goal.

title: INFORMATION SECURITY AND AUDIT
description: Study methods to protect data and audit information systems.

title: NETWORK SECURITY AND ANALYSIS
description: Understand threats and safeguards in network communication systems.
